text: "Genie in a Bottle" is a 1999 pop song by American singer Christina Aguilera, from her first album Christina Aguilera. It was her first hit single and got to number one on the Billboard Hot 100. Aguilera got a Grammy Award nomination for it and a Grammy Award for Best New Artist later in the year. ==Charts== Chart (1999) Peak position Australia (ARIA) 2 Austria 1 Belgium (Flanders) 1 Belgium (Wallonia) 3 Canadian Singles Chart 1 Finland 6 France 3 Netherlands 3 New Zealand (RIANZ) 2 Norway 1 Sweden 5 Switzerland 2 UK Singles Chart (Official Charts Company) 1 US Billboard Hot 100 1 US Mainstream Top 40 (Billboard) 1 == References == Category:1999 songs Category:Christina Aguilera songs Category:Billboard Hot 100 number one songs Category:Teen pop songs Category:Dance-pop songs Category:R&B; songs Category:Latin music songs
title: Genie in a Bottle
